senses.synonym: 00118572-v (keep informed; \""He kept up on his country's foreign policies\"");00150596-v (behave in accordance or in agreement with; \""Follow a pattern\""; \""Follow my example\"");00352060-v (keep to; \""Stick to your principles\""; \""stick to the diet\"");00591133-v (grasp the meaning; \""Can you follow her argument?\""; \""When he lectures, I cannot follow\"");00731071-v (follow, discover, or ascertain the course of development of something; \""We must follow closely the economic development is Cuba\""; \""trace the student's progress\""; \""trace one's ancestry\"");01732234-v (perform an accompaniment to; \""The orchestra could barely follow the frequent pitch changes of the soprano\"");01748331-v (imitate in behavior; take as a model; \""Teenagers follow their friends in everything\"");01995963-v (travel along a certain course; \""follow the road\""; \""follow the trail\"");02002464-v (to travel behind, go after, come after; \""The ducklings followed their mother around the pond\""; \""Please follow the guide through the museum\"");02004900-v (follow in or as if in pursuit; \""The police car pursued the suspected attacker\""; \""Her bad deed followed her and haunted her dreams all her life\"");02203116-v (keep under surveillance; \""The police had been following him for weeks but they could not prove his involvement in the bombing\"");02351891-v (choose and follow; as of theories, ideas, policies, strategies or plans; \""She followed the feminist movement\""; \""The candidate espouses Republican ideals\"");02411715-v (be the successor (of); \""Carter followed Ford\""; \""Will Charles succeed to the throne?\"");02450790-v (work in a specific place, with a specific subject, or in a specific function; \""He is a herpetologist\""; \""She is our resident philosopher\"");02460829-v (follow with the eyes or the mind; \""Keep an eye on the baby, please!\""; \""The world is watching Sarajevo\""; \""She followed the men with the binoculars\"");02547977-v (act in accordance with someone's rules, commands, or wishes; \""He complied with my instructions\""; \""Let's follow our great helmsman!\""; \""She followed a guru for years\"");02631420-v (to be the product or result; \""Melons come from a vine\""; \""Understanding comes from experience\"");02718647-v (be later in time; \""Tuesday always follows Monday\"");02726024-v (come as a logical consequence; follow logically; \""It follows that your assertion is false\""; \""the theorem falls out nicely\"");02726229-v (come after in time, as a result; \""A terrible tsunami followed the earthquake\"");02726419-v (be next; \""Mary plays best, with John and Sue following\"");02726572-v (to bring something about at a later time than; \""She followed dinner with a brandy\"";
